title: Part-time Customer Service Representative (Dutch/German)
job_overview:
We are looking for a reliable and self-motivated customer service representative to manage email inquiries for three online stores.

The work is primarily responding to emails in Dutch and German (translation tools allowed), sometimes in English.
 • Approx. 2 hours per day to start, with possibility to increase hours soon upon agreement.
 • Duties: answering emails, providing order updates, handling return instructions, and tracking common customer issues.
 • Experience with Shopify, Gmail and using translation tools is a plus.

Please start your application with “I understand this is mainly Dutch and German support.”
